Default dependencies here and yaml are required for config.yml parsing to obtain parameters.
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(here)
library(yaml)
```



Load the packages for this specific Rmd notebook.
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(DESeq2)
library(apeglm)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
```



Run differential expression testing
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
RNA_seq_dds <- DESeq(RNA_seq_dds)
```



Plot dispersion estimates
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
plotDispEsts(RNA_seq_dds)
```



Define contrasts, extract results table, and shrink the log2 fold changes, specify groups for comparison
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
RNA_seq_res_table_unshrunken <- results(RNA_seq_dds,
                                        contrast=c("sampletype", "Treatment", "Control"),
                                        alpha = 0.05,
                                        pAdjustMethod = "BH")
resultsNames(RNA_seq_dds)
RNA_seq_res_table <- lfcShrink(RNA_seq_dds, coef="sampletype_Treatment_vs_Control", type="apeglm")
RNA_seq_res_table
```

MA plot
Specifically call the DESeq2 version of plotMA, if not it would call the plotMA from limma.
https://rdrr.io/bioc/limma/man/plotma.html
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
DESeq2::plotMA(RNA_seq_res_table_unshrunken, ylim=c(-4, 4))
DESeq2::plotMA(RNA_seq_res_table, ylim=c(-4, 4))
```



Inspect DE results
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
mcols(RNA_seq_res_table, use.names=T)
RNA_seq_res_table %>% data.frame() %>% View()
```



Plot counts of a specific gene
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
plotCounts(RNA_seq_dds, gene="ENSG00000132170", intgroup="sampletype")
```



Summarize results and preview
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
summary(RNA_seq_res_table)
RNA_seq_res05 <- results(RNA_seq_dds, alpha=0.05)
summary(RNA_seq_res05)
```

Set thresholds for Fold change and adjusted p-value
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
FC1.2 <- 0.263 # The equivalent log2FC for both
FC1.5 <- 0.585
FC2.0 <- 1
padj_cutoff <- 0.05
l2fc_cutoff <- FC2.0
RNA_seq_res_table_tb <- RNA_seq_res_table %>% data.frame() %>% rownames_to_column(var="Ensembl ID") %>% as_tibble()
RNA_seq_sigDEGS <- RNA_seq_res_table_tb %>% filter(padj < padj_cutoff & abs(log2FoldChange) > l2fc_cutoff)
RNA_seq_sigDEGS
```
